name: Formula Dash
description:
Formula Dash - the analysis game for AndroidNEW UPDATE INTRODUCES SPEED MODE AND MORE THAN 400 FORMULAS!!!!!!

We have a google play store site now:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

This game is about maths. The game's concept is simple: It shows you an mathematical expression and you have to decide whether it is equal to zero or tends towards infinity. But can you solve them all under pressure of time?

It is perfectly suitable for:

  • all students of science and maths.
  • all fans of limits, series, integrals, functions
  • all fans of mathematical symbols
  • all fans of destruction and cool particle effects ;)

Download the app now!
